title: 3 and Out - Herbert Emergence; Dak's Injury Reality; Falcons Rebuild; Taking Tomlin For Granted; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Herbert Emergence; Dak's Injury Reality; Falcons Rebuild; Taking Tomlin For Granted; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John looks at the continued emergence of Justin Herbert, if the Cowboys could use Dak Prescott's ankle injury to avoid paying him a long term deal, which direction the Falcons should go after firing their coach and GM, why Mike Tomlin deserves more credit for Pittsburgh's absurd consistency, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
